content: You pick up the candle from the table and make your way towards the wooden door. As you approach, you notice that the door is old and creaky, with rusty hinges. With a push, the door slowly opens, revealing a narrow corridor with more doors leading in different directions. The corridor is lit by dim torches mounted on the walls, casting long shadows around you. You can hear distant sounds of movement and murmurs coming from one of the doors further down the hall. You take a deep breath and step into the corridor, ready to begin your adventure.
